1.content:
The alien, invisible spirit had arrived on Earth just moments ago. As it was hovering over the landscape, it was carefully scanning the minds of the people that were going about their lives down below.

The spirit had passed over a small coastal community, where it found itself hovering over a school, a neighborhood, a church, and a small business district.

People were going about their lives and they weren't aware of the fact that their thoughts and feelings were being watched and analyzed.

Occasionally, the spirit would come across a person, who often had one other person on his or her mind. It could be a spouse, a child, a relative, a parent, a co-worker, a best friend, a coach, a teacher, etc.

The spirit found several people who qualified to receive the unusual power to control the mind and body of the one child, friend, etc. in question...

The spirit spotted two boys, Drew and Jared, while they strolled through the large, inner city park. The boys had just passed over a large, grassy field, when they suddenly fell unconscious for the first time, together.

As they lay on the grass, the spirit examined them, and realized that Drew cared a lot for Jared. Drew was strong and athletic, but Jared wasn’t. He was short, skinny and slow in sports, and he wasn’t strong or athletic at all. The spirit examined each boy’s thoughts, emotions, wishes and desires, and it determined that Drew should be given complete control over Jared.

Drew is already a jock, and Jared is the geek. Jared is very smart, he's just not strong physically, or athletic at all.

Drew would have the ability to change any part of Jared’s body. He could make him shrink, grow, or change in any other way. He could make Jared older, younger, and any other age in-between. He could add parts or features to Jared’s body, and he could change Jared into any object, article, animal or any other living creature, that he desired in his thoughts. Lastly, Drew would have complete and absolute control over Jared, and he could do anything except kill him.

So, where do the boys go, after they wake up at the park?

111.content:
The kids in PE class were just standing around as the coach took a phone call in the office right after the boys had finished playing a game of dodge ball. Everyone was sweaty and tired, including Drew. But, when Drew looked around, he spotted Jared just sitting on the basketball court, in the corner, and all by himself.

Then Drew got the idea to try something cool.

"I want Jared to start floating three feet above the ground!" He thought.

Instantly, Jared became weightless, just as Drew commanded, and his body began to rise up and come off the wooden basketball court, until the boy was hovering about three feet above the court, as if he were floating in space.

"Hey! What gives?" Jared gasped, as he couldn't get back on the ground.

"This is so cool!" Drew thought to himself as he looked on. "I can control Jared's body again!"

Just then one of the other boys announced that the coach had to leave the school because his mother was sick. They still had an hour of class. The boys wanted to play soccer and others wanted to play basketball but all the balls were locked up in the storage cabinet and the coach was away.

Then Drew got an idea...

Class ends, so Drew shrinks Jared into an action figure
1113.content:
The four boys in Jared’s gym class had a large, indoor gym all to themselves. Unfortunately, the coach wasn’t there, and the storage room was locked, so there were no balls to play with. So, there they were, staring at a soccer goal and at a basketball hoop, but they had no soccer ball and no basketball.

“Man, if I can’t find a ball to kick, shoot or throw around here, I’m gonna SCREAM!” one boy named Adam groaned.

“This sucks!” Jack sighed. “How come nobody has the key to the storage room?”

“We need to find something we can toss around to each other, quick!” Drew pondered.

“I just wanna go home…. I’m SO bored” Jared grumbled. “This is the most boring PE class ever!”

All four boys were wearing gym shorts, tank tops and sneakers, so they were ready to play. But, they had nothing to play with. Then, Drew had an idea!

“I can give us something to toss around!” Drew smiled as he turned and glanced at his buddy, Jared.

“Huh? What? HEY! What… What are you doing? What…?” Jared gasped as he felt something change about him. He suddenly felt very… LIGHT! Then, his feet started to leave the ground. He was floating a few inches off the ground! “HEY!”

“There! You only weigh a few ounces now, kinda like a helium balloon!” Drew explained as he reached over and grabbed Jared’s right ankle by his hand, easily lifting and holding Jared in the air.

“Hey! How did you do that?” Adam shouted. “You’re lifting him up with one hand?”

“Sure! I’ll toss him over to you! He’s light as a feather, now! CATCH!” Drew shouted, as he hurled Jared over to Adam, who reached out with both hands and caught Jared by the waist, like he would catch a basketball.

“Ohhh! He’s so light!” Adam smiled, while holding Jared in the air with his hands.

“HEY!” Jared shouted. “What are you guys doing!!??”

“Over here! Throw him to me!” Jack shouted, with his arms extended.

“Okay, go back…. Wayyyyy back!” Adam instructed his buddy. Adam was a football player who was known for throwing long passes as the Quarterback on the football team. “Here he comes!”

Adam pulled his arm back, holding Jared by the shirt, before launching Jared high into the air. Jared found himself soaring high over the gym floor, soaring through the air, as Jack backed off even farther with his arms in the air, ready to make the catch. Jared almost touched the 40-foot ceiling of the indoor gymnasium before spiraling down towards the point where Jack was standing. Jack stood ready and caught Jared above his head like a football!

“GOT HIM! Whoohoo!” Jack cheered.

“HEY! I’M NOT A FOOTBALL! I’M A HUMAN BEING!!” Jared screamed at him.

“Oh, hush! You’re as light as a ball and we’re gonna toss you around!” Jack smiled as he prepared to throw Jared back to Drew.

The boys continued to toss Jared around, until…
1113.title: Drew keeps Jared weightless so the boys just to...

choices: Drew puts Jared on the swimming, water polo and diving teams in the pool

11131.content:
The boys spent almost thirty minutes tossing Jared around. At first, Jared protested, but after a minute or so, he had gotten used to it. Besides, he was so light, that even if one of the boys couldn’t catch him, he would never just fall to the floor. He would just float above the ground, just like a balloon.

Finally, the bell rang, and the boys all started running towards the locker room, leaving Jared behind.

“HEY! Don’t forget about me!” he shouted, just before Drew exited the gym.

“Oh, sorry dude!” Drew said, as he commanded Jared to return to normal. Jared quickly dropped to the floor, landing on his feet, as his weight increased to normal. He was no longer weightless!

Inside the locker room, the other boys were all excited about tossing Jared around like a football.

“That was so COOL!” Adam smiled. “So, what else can you do to him?”

“I can muscle him up, make him older, I can shrink him, or I can make him taller!” Drew explained, just as Jared walked in.

“Darn! I wish I had these cool powers over him! I could make him into one of the guys on our football team!” Adam stated, since he was the Quarterback on the football team. “Or, have him play on the basketball team or on the baseball team! He would be awesome!”

“Hey man, I would make him into one of the guys on the soccer team or one of our players on the wrestling team or on the track team, especially if I could grow his muscles and make him stronger and faster!” Jack explained. “I could use a dude like Jared!”

“Well, I’m more into aquatic sports. I was going to try him out on the swim team and on the diving team myself, but I really like your ideas a lot!” Drew pondered as he listened to his friends. “The water polo team needs new players as well.”

“Oh, boy… Looks like I’m going to be playing a lot of sports pretty soon!” Jared sighed as he rolled his eyes.

Drew huddled up with Adam and Jack.

“Guys, I can temporarily pass on my powers over Jared to you guys if you want him to play on your sports teams! You can make him grow bigger, taller and stronger! You can change his clothes and make him wear any uniform you want!” Drew explained to them. “It’s really easy! You can make him into the best player in any sport on any team!”

“Seriously? I don’t have to get him a new soccer uniform? Or a wrestling leotard? Or running shoes for track?” Jack asked him.

“No! I just snap my fingers! Look!” Drew smiled as he made the boys turn around and glance at Jared, who was bust brushing his hair before the mirror in the locker room. Jared was wearing a t-shirt and blue jeans with his tennis shoes.

Drew snapped his fingers and Jared was instantly engulfed by a bright, blue light, which lasted a second.

Instantly, Jared was wearing soccer cleats, black soccer shorts and a red soccer jersey with long red socks along with shin guards under the socks. Jared didn’t even notice that his clothes had changed at first.

“Huh? What happened to my clothes? Why am I wearing a soccer uniform?” Jared sighed as he looked down at the rest of his body. “Am I playing soccer now?”

“OH! That’s so COOL!” Jack cheered. “I wanna be able to do that! We NEED him on our team!”

“Okay, let’s take turns. One weekend, Jack can have him. Next week, Adam can have him. Then, I’ll take him and have him swim and dive in the pool!” Drew explained.

“DEAL!” Jack and Adam cheered in unison.

“Okay, Jared! Get ready to play a LOT of sports!” Drew shouted at Jared.

“Uhh…. Fine… Nothing I can do to stop you guys…” Jared just shrugged.

Then, Drew held Jack and Adam’s hands tight and concentrated, sharing his wonderful powers over Jared with his two, athletic buddies while Jared just looked on. Jared just sighed. What were Adam and Jack going to do to him?

1131.content:
Jared was doing the bench press as Drew looked on. But Drew wanted to make it easy on him so he made Jared’s pecs grow by 30 pounds of muscle while he was raising the 100-pound bar.

Jared just started pressing the bar upwards when he felt a tingling in his chest. His pecs began to inflate, pushing outwards from his chest but giving him more strength at the same time. Suddenly, it became easier to lift the bar and he did a dozen reps!

When he was done, Jared added another 30 pounds to the bar and he tried again. Just before he lifted the bar, Drew added another 30 pounds of muscle to his pecs! Jared felt that tingling again, and his pectorals grew even bigger, growing into large mounds of rock-hard muscle. Jared did another 12 reps before setting the bar back, without even breaking a sweat.

Finally, this happened a third time. Jared was overcome by that tingling in his chest again and he felt his pectorals grow again, pushing outwards and sideways as Drew looked on. When he was done, he set the bar back on the rack and stood up, facing the mirror. His pecs were HUGE! He had two large ovals sticking out from his chest like big medicine balls which were as hard as concrete, separate by a deep cleavage! His shoulders were super-wide because of this!

“Darn! What happened to my chest?” Jared wondered as he turned sideways to admire his massive pectorals. His pecs were sticking out by more than 8 inches from his frame and resembled something like huge oval-shaped bricks coming out from his chest.

“You look great, dude! I love your massive pecs!” Drew grinned. “Come on, let’s get home!”

The boys left the gym and started walking when it began to drizzle. A light rain started to come down and the boys didn’t bring an umbrella.

“Hey! I got an idea!” Drew smiled.

Suddenly, Jared started to grow another foot taller! His legs grew longer and longer until he was over 7 feet tall. Next, his massive pectorals pushed outwards even further, until they were like two large lumps of muscle sticking out from Jared’s chest by a foot!

Jared just stood in the rain when Drew walked over to him and stood right in front of him but with his entire body just barely fitting under Jared’s large pectorals, which acted like a small shelter. Drew remained dry as he stood under the wide and long pectorals which were above his head as the two boys waited for the rain to stop.

“Thanks for the shelter, big guy…” Drew grinned, looking up at Jared’s huge pectorals, which he was admiring from below.

“Uhh… Don’t mention it…” Jared sighed, seeing that he was getting soaked. “I’m totally drenched already!”

“Don’t worry, dude… I can make you all dry again as soon as it stops raining!” Drew laughed.

Jared just stood there, in the rain, with Drew standing closely in front of him, under his huge pecs, waiting for the rain to stop…

1132.content:
After the boys had left the dodge ball game, they walked back to their house since school was over. Jared was amazed how easy the class was now that Drew was able to make him bigger, taller and stronger whenever he wanted.

Drew decided to leave Jared alone and he walked home, leaving Jared alone at his house. Jared just read a book in bed as Drew went home to take a nap since he was feeling tired.

After he woke up from his nap, he grabbed his stack of muscle magazines, which he loved to look through, and he grabbed a new issue and started flipping through the pages, glancing at the pages of all the bodybuilders.

Drew glanced at a photo of a young muscle guy who resembled Jared. The only difference was, this young guy had huge biceps.

“Wow! Look at his biceps! I bet I could make Jared’s biceps - and the rest of his arms - grow every time I look at muscle pictures!” Drew mumbled, not realizing he actually activated his powers.

Soon enough, a second later, Jared felt a tingling over his biceps. It came over him and went away. So, he ignored it.

But the tingling intensified. Drew was looking at pictures of young bodybuilders and that sent his power to Jared’s biceps. Jared felt that tingling which led to a sudden growth spurt! Suddenly, his biceps inflated and both of his biceps increased in size by about two inches, becoming like two large lumps of muscle in his arms!

“Uhhhhh… What the hell?” Jared gasped, looking to his arms, first the left, then the right, as he noticed his inflated biceps right away. “What gives?”

He lowered his arms from flexing and wondered what had happened. The only thing was, another minute later, the growth spurt would return…

11322.content:
Jared was just relaxing in his bedroom at home since it was pouring rain and there was nothing to do outside. Then, after a few hours had passed, he became thirsty and decided to get something to drink. He got up and walked to the kitchen and poured himself a cup of cold water in a plastic cup.



As he was about to walk back to his bedroom, he was suddenly overcome with that weird, intense tingling in his arms! It was so intense, that he was forced to set the cup of water down on the kitchen counter, and just in time.

He was suddenly overcome by a very strong urge to make fists and to raise up his arms, flexing his big, bulging biceps on both arms.

“Urrhhhh… What the hell?” he mumbled as he admired his guns.

Then it happened. Suddenly, his biceps became stiff and rock-hard. Both of them, at the same time!

Finally, his biceps started to GROW, becoming bigger, harder, heavier and larger, inflating from the size of small football to the size of soccer balls in the matter of seconds! His biceps grew into large, rock-hard orbs of steel, sticking out from his arms like huge, round orbs of steel-plated muscle, almost as big as bowling balls. His arms became hard and heavy as they filled up with insane physical strength. His forearms also bulged and grew thicker and wider as Jared felt a surge of physical strength coarse through his arms that was just totally unreal!

“Holy frick!” he gasped as he was finally able to relax his fingers and lower his arms. His biceps were absolutely HUGE! He had enormous biceps sticking out from his arms, and that was even without flexing. But even that had become hard, for he was almost forced to flex with every movement he made which required the use of his arms or his fingers. “I’m freaking strong!”

He turned around and grabbed the plastic cup from the counter. Almost immediately, the cup cracked and burst from Jared’s enormous strength, cracking in half and spilling water all over the kitchen floor.

“Awww no way!” Jared sighed, holding the broken plastic cup in his hand. “Damn! I’m just too strong!”

He turned around and pulled on the paper towel roll, accidentally yanking the roll off the counter and onto the floor.

“Ack! I’m so clumsy!” he gentry set the roll back and bent the roll using his mighty fingers, thanks to his steel grip. Then, he cleaned up the spilled water on the floor. When he lifted up the lid of the trash can, he yanked it off and broke it with his bare hands.

“Arghh…. I keep on breaking stuff!” he mumbled as he threw the paper towels away in the broken trash can.

Then he grabbed a metal cup from the cupboard, which he tore off the hinges first. He filled the cup with water from the fridge, where he bent the handle. Then he carefully walked back to his bedroom where he snapped and pulled the doorknob off the bedroom door, thanks to his insane strength.

“Ohh man… I keep on breaking stuff… Mom is gonna kill me!”

He lay down on his bed and decided to relax, hoping he would not grow anymore…

113222.content:
Drew got tired of looking at the magazine with all the pictures of guys with huge biceps. So, he put the magazine down and got up to get a drink. After he returned to his room, he looked through his stack of muscle magazines and just smiled.

“Ohh here we go! These guys have big muscles everywhere, not just big biceps!” Drew giggled. “Jared should also grow the rest of his muscles, not just his biceps alone!”

As Drew said that, Jared was overcome by a soft, faint tingling sensation as he lay on his bed in his bedroom, about a block away from where Drew lived. The tingle was soft and sweet and it didn’t hurt at all. But it was enough to alert him that Drew’s amazing powers were always working in his body and there was nothing Jared could ever do to stop it or prevent it. Drew could change or control his body from anywhere he wanted and anytime he wanted, just by thinking of something and Jared could never stop it. Basically, Drew could even grow Jared’s muscles just by dreaming about it. All it took was a thought or a suggestion, from anyone or anything. Just by glancing at pictures of bodybuilders alone, Drew could make Jared’s muscles grow without even knowing it.

Jared just lay there with his eyes closed. In fact, he had dozed off for about an hour or so when he was suddenly awakened. He was overcome by that weird, strange tingling sensation all over his body again. This time, the tingling affected all his muscles, not just his huge, massive biceps. Now, his biceps were already huge from experiencing two huge growth spurts a few minutes earlier. They were, together with his triceps and his bulging arms, as big and as round as basketballs. But, this tingling sensation indicated that it didn’t matter how big they were. They were going to grow even more and there was nothing Jared could do about it!

Suddenly, Jared’s pectorals started to push outwards and sideways at the same time, ripping apart his t-shirt. It had already become hard to wear a shirt due to his huge biceps, but the bulging pecs just made it totally impossible now. Next, his expanding and widening torso filled up with bigger, bulging abdominal muscles which were just unreal. From there, the growth moved further south and affected the legs.

Jared’s thin legs expanded as well. His quads grew wider and deeper as well, growing so wide that they stuck out passed his waist. His quads bulged with layers of muscle above the knees as thick cords of muscle filled out his shorts until they tore in half.

Finally, Jared’s calves inflated like mighty balloons, growing bigger, harder and more round and sticking out from the back of his legs like soccer balls covered in veins. His calves grew so thick that they rubbed up against one another.

“Holy crap!” Jared gasped as he woke up from all the growth.

He slowly got up from his bed as he managed to raise up his thick, heavy body off the mattress. He felt incredibly heavy and strong.

“Uhh… Now I’m really BIG!” he gasped, while staring at his reflection in the mirror.

He had just started to walk towards the door to go outside, when…

“Oh? He’s still asleep? Oh, no problem. I’ll wake him up! Thanks, Miss Julie!” Drew said as he walked up the stairs to Jared’s bedroom. From there, he turned the knob on the door, realizing that the doorknob was bent.

“Ohh, darn, did Jared do that?” he wondered, before he quietly opened the door.

When Drew walked in, he spotted Jared sleeping under the covers. He snuck up to the large figure, which was covered by the sheets and the big, heavy blanket, and he slowly pulled the blanket off from the large body, revealing a much bigger, muscular body than he was used to seeing from Jared.

“Dang….” Drew sighed. “He’s huge!”

Very slowly, Jared’s muscles started to dwindle down in size. His pecs flattened out, his arms became thinner, and his legs shortened out again. His chest became flat and then, losing his huge pecs and abs. Within moments, Jared reverted back to a very average looking teenage boy with no muscular features at all.

“Gosh, it’s nice to be NORMAL for a change!” Jared smiled, as he examined his thin arms and legs. Jared was actually very skinny.

“Don’t get used to this, dude. I think you look too…. Plain! Ugh!” Drew sighed. “You NEED more muscle on your bones!”

113222111.content:
Drew got on his laptop and pulled up the local news website for that day.

“Hey, Jared! The county fair’s in town! It’s will be at the fairgrounds for the next three weekends! Wanna go? They got food, games, prizes and fun stuff!” Drew said excitedly.

“Aww, dude! Isn’t that usually expensive? I mean…. Doesn’t it cost a ton of money to get tickets to get in there?” Jared wondered.

Drew found a picture of the main entrance of the fairgrounds. There was a sign there, but it was impossible to read on the website.

“Crap! I bet it tells the prices over there! Hmm…” Drew sighed as he looked on while Jared was getting dressed. Then, he realized that he could just send Jared over there to check the prices. He waited for Jared to put on his shoes before he mentioned it again.

“Hey, are you ready?” he asked Jared.

“I guess. How much money do we need?” Jared asked.

“You go found out for us!” Drew smiled, as he snapped his fingers.

Jared vanished into thin air and popped up at the entrance of the fairgrounds.

“Whoa! I’m here already!” Jared exclaimed as he looked around. Then he saw the sign with the entrance prices… $10 per person.

Jared was about to walk in when he disappeared again and popped back in his bedroom, where Drew was standing.

“Hey!” Jared sighed.

“So, did you see the entrance fee at the fair?” Drew asked him.

“Uhh, yeah… ten bucks per person!” Jared replied. “You sent me to the entrance where I saw the sign!”

So, Drew went up to his mom and asked her for some cash. He came back with $20 in cash. Finally, Drew grabbed hold of Jared’s arm.

“I know that if I teleport you back to the fairgrounds while I’ll hold on to you then I can go along with you for the ride! So, here we go!”

Both Jared and Drew disappeared from the bedroom and both boys popped up at the entrance to the fair.

“Hey! You’re also here!” Jared noted.

“Of course! Technically, you’re the only one who teleports, but I can go along with you for the ride if I hold on to you! You’re the vehicle but I’m the driver!” Drew explained.

Drew paid the entrance fee and they strolled in. There were many food booths and game booths there, along with small shows and performances for them to view along the way.

While strolling around, the boys suddenly came to a small stage where they spotted a large, muscular man with the sign “Hercules” in front of him.

“Come and meet Hercules! Shake his hand and feel his muscles! He can lift heavy things and bend steel bars!”

“Ohh, wow!” Jared sighed.

“I’m not impressed! I can make you big enough, so you can do that, too!” Drew laughed.

“Ladies and gentlemen! Step right up! Meet the strongest man at the fair today! Come and be amazed by Hercules, our very own strongman! Look at his enormous muscles! If you like what you see, please deposit a few Dollars in the box below!” a man in a nice suit announced as he stood next to the muscle man.

“Aww…. He’s not so big!” Drew shouted. “My buddy, Jared, is much bigger and stronger than him!”

“Oh? Where is your big friend?” the man in the suit shouted. “Let him come on stage!”

Drew then turned to Jared.

“Get on stage! Now!”

“What? What are you gonna do?” Jared shouted.

In the meantime, a small crowd was staring at them and laughing at Jared, the skinny, short teen who was standing on the stage.

Then it happened.

Jared’s pectorals suddenly began to BULGE out of his t-shirt, ripping his shirt straight down the middle as two large globes of pectoral muscle burst free, expanding in every direction and making Jared’s shoulders twice as wide as before while two big, round packs of muscle blasted out from his chest like half-size basketballs.

“UUUUHHHRRAAHH!!!” Jared roared as he felt his chest blow up with muscle. This suddenly hushed the crowd!

Next, his flat stomach grew wider and became more defined as mighty, washboard abdominal muscles appeared over his amazing stomach. Muscles, which weren’t there moments before. His torso widened more, ripping the rest of his shirt apart.

Next, Jared’s arms grew twice as thick and twice as wide as before, adding mighty biceps and triceps, blowing additional holes in whatever remained of that t-shirt. Huge, round, hard balls of muscle formed on his arms between his shoulders and his elbows, covered with veins, as Jared was forced to flex his mighty guns for the first time.

“OOOHHHHH…” Jared moaned loudly as the crowd gasped in amazement.

Finally, Jared’s quads exploded with raw muscles, growing three times as wide and as thick as before, adding layers of muscle to the legs, making them grow into big columns of muscle between the waist and the knees. His quads became wider than his waist, growing into huge mounds of rock-hard muscle which were covered in thick, long veins as well.

Lastly, his calves grow out from the back of his legs, pushing outwards and inflating into massive mounds of muscle that only Olympian track stars could envy. Big, hard, bulging diamond-shaped lumps of muscle the size of footballs inflated on the back of his legs, forming huge mounds which were clearly visible from the back and the front of his legs because they were so insanely huge and wide.

To top it off, Jared’s mighty legs grew a foot thicker and longer, making the boy stand a foot taller as well, easily allowing him to tower over Hercules by a few inches. Now, Jared was far bigger, taller and much more muscular than the bodybuilder who was standing there as a witness to the incredible growth spurt who got to witness how the skinny, short teenage boy transformed into this hulking bodybuilder before his very eyes!

The crowd just stood there, completely awe struck, as they also witnessed the transformation.

Jared pulled his torn t-shirt off and he tossed it in the trash. Meanwhile, Drew used his powers to transform Jared’s too-tight jeans into flexible, stretchy Lycra shorts, revealing all of the boy’s huge muscles.

Drew told Harold the story of the day when him and Jared passed out together and ever since the day he was able to change Jared every way he wanted.

“Amazing! So, you can make his muscles grow as big as you want? And, you can shrink them back again?” Harold gasped.

“Yeah! I can make Jared as big, as tall and as muscular as I want to!” Drew grinned.

Drew and Jared just smiled and stared at each other.

Jared just shrugged.

“Okay… I’m in. Make me as big as you want. For a thousand bucks…”

“Alright! You guys get to show off next to Hercules and every hour Jared outgrows Hercules on stage! Deal?” Harold smiles. “Jared shrinks before the show and then he grows back on stage!”

“Okay… Anything else?” Drew asked.

“Make him grow bigger…. Like a giant…. As he walks around the fairgrounds!” Harold suggested.

“Ohhh wow!” Jared smiled.

“You’re gonna be a big star, dude… Literally!” Drew laughed.

The two boys and Harold shook hands. Then they signed a contract. They walked out and they prepared for the next showing….

Drew just smiled as he got up and glanced over at his best friend, who now looked completely normal, like he was never changed.

“Ugh…. I got some studying to do,dude…” Jared sighed. “Maybe we can hang out afterwards?”

“Sure. I’ll go home. I’ll text you later, okay?”

Drew left the house and went home. He lived right next door to Jared’s house, so the walk home was very short. As soon as Drew got back into his room, he got at his desk and he finished his homework assignments. Once he was done, he got on his bed. He started to wonder what Jared was doing.

Thanks to the fantastic powers that were given him, Drew had absolute control over Jared. As soon as he closed his eyes and began to think about his best friend, a vision came to him. Drew was suddenly able to “see” what Jared was seeing right that minute. He saw that Jared was reading from his history book and that he was studying a chapter about Christopher Columbus. Jared was taking notes and making them in his notebook. Drew saw everything that Jared was writing in his notebook. In fact, Drew could even hear Jared’s thoughts and he detected all his feelings.

Just then, Jared’s mother walked in the bedroom and she presented Jared with a small card.

“Hey, Jared. One of your friends, Andy, is having a pool party down the street! It starts in an hour. You want to go?” she asked her son.

Jared was about to say no, but Drew read what he was thinking before he said it.

“Jared should say…. ‘Sure, mom. That sounds like fun! I’d love to go to a pool party this afternoon!’” Drew thought.

“Sure, mom. That sounds like fun! I’d love to go to a pool party this afternoon!” Jared then replied.

Right after he said that, Jared almost wondered why he said that and what made him say that. He just wanted to stay home! What the heck?

“I’m so happy you’re spending more time outside with your friends and less time home alone at the computer! Great!” his mom smiled as she walked out of the room.

Jared just frowned. He felt as if something “foced” him to say that.

In the meantime, Drew just giggled while he lay on his bed in his bedroom.

“Aww…. That was so cool! I can make him do anything I want to, even from long distance!” he laughed. “I should grow his muscles when he arrives at the pool party!”

About an hour later, Jared arrived at his friend’s house. He walked to the back yard, where several kids were already swimming in the pool. Jared removed his sandals and he tossed his towel on one of the lounge chairs. He was only wearing a red Speedo to cover his groin.

Jared carefully stepped into the pool, walking down the concrete steps. Once he got in, he swam around. He got out after a few minutes, dripping water everywhere.

As he stood near the edge of the pool, he was suddenly overcome by a strong, tingling sensation.

“Ohhhh…. What’s going on?” he moaned.

Several kids looked on as they witness Jared’s weird growth spurt.

Suddenly, Jared’s biceps inflated, out of nowhere. His triceps and his biceps bulged with muscle, making his arms seem MUCH bigger than they were before!

“Wow! Did you guys notice Jared’s arms?” one girl mentioned.

Then, Jared’s pectorals began to bulge all over. They grew outwards and sideways, pushing his shoulders farther apart. He suddenly gained an impressive V-taper now that his shoulders became MUCH wider than they had been, moments before. Big, round, rock-hard spheres of muscle were now sticking out from Jared’s chest.

“Wow, Jared! Where did all that muscle come from?” Andy, one of his friends asked him.

“Uhh…. Umm, Well…” Jared stammered, not knowing what to say.

“Ha ha ha ha!” Drew laughed loudly as he followed along what was happening with Jared over long distance thanks to his powers. “This is GREAT!”

Jared was speechless. How was he going to explain his sudden, weird muscle growth spurt at the poolside, with all the kids watching him?

The following two days, Jared didn’t hear a peep out of Drew. His buddy was locked up in his room, stuck behind the computer, looking up historical information about wars, battles, pictures and famous rules, while putting together a big cardboard presentation for a history fair. It was a lot of work. Unfortunately, it took all his mind off Jared. After two days, Drew was exhausted and he was just resting in bed, when he finally dozed off.

Drew suddenly heard a sound in his room, which woke him up. When he opened his eyes, he saw a very bright light, which left a strange figure in his room once the light dimmed. It seemed like a figure of an old man wearing a long, brown robe with a rope around his waist.

“Whaah! Who are you? What are you doing here?” Drew mumbled.

The old man suddenly shrunk down, changing and becoming younger as he gained more hair. He was shorter, as he gained muscle. His face became more youthful and handsome. He quickly changed into a teenage boy with blond hair and blue eyes, while still wearing a brown robe.

“It’s alright, Drew… That’s why I’m here…. To see how I can help… You haven’t grown his muscles in a couple of days, so I wanted to see how I can help you” the teen replied.

“Aww…. I bet he feels I’m ignoring him…” Drew sighed sadly.

Immediately, Jared felt a sharp tingling sensation through his body, specifically in his body. It was as if Drew had commanded something a second time, like he had a few minutes earlier! His muscles started to grow again, all at once!

“Drew… I’m feeling… UHHH!” Jared groaned just as his arms bulged with MORE muscle!

Jared’s biceps inflated even BIGGER as his triceps expanded to awesome proportions. His chest barreled even further outward and sideways, making his shoulders rip his shirt apart. His abdominal muscles became incredibly defined, bigger than those of a professional bodybuilder. He now had an impressive 8-pack! Jared’s quads now exploded with even MORE muscle, becoming bigger and wider, becoming over a foot wide!

“Whaaahhh! DREW!!!” Jared screamed as he felt his body becoming super-muscular.

“Uhh…. Ohh wow…” Drew sniffled as he looked on at his larger buddy.

“Do something!” Jared gasped. “Can you shrink me down a little???”

“Uhh…. I’m trying! I’m trying! I got a splitting headache!” Drew groaned as he tried to concentrate on Jared’s muscles, in an attempt to shrink them back to normal.

Drew and Jared were on the way to the public library, which was right down the street from school, and just a few blocks away from the house, where Jared lived. Since Drew and Jared were practically next-door neighbors, they went everywhere together, just to keep one another company.

'Man, I'm so tired right now'' Jared complained, as he stumbled along towards the library.

Drew was in much better shape than Jared, and he knew it. It annoyed him that Jared was complaining again, but this time, he realize that he had the power to do something about it so that he could help out Jared, who was his best friend in school.

Drew then jumped slightly in front of Jared, before he turned to face him.

'Stop right here'' Drew commanded. Suddenly, Jared stopped walking, and he stood still in the middle of the street sidewalk.

'Hey! What's going on here? I can't move my legs!' Jared gasped, as his legs had completely frozen to the floor, thanks to Drew's command.

'You need some muscle in those skinny legs of yours. I'm tired of looking at them. Time for some more muscle!' Drew said to him.

Suddenly, Jared felt an odd warm sensation in his legs. He gasped, as he looked down at his legs! His calves and his quads increased slightly in size and width, suddenly giving him more strength in his legs!

'Wow! What are you doing?'

'I'm just adding a little muscle to your legs, so that you'll stop complaining about being so tired all the time!' Drew laughed. 'There' Doesn't that feel better?'

Suddenly, the growth stopped, and Jared was looking down at two very muscular legs, which were much bigger than what he had at first!

'Wow! That was amazing!' he exclaimed. 'And, yes, I feel much better now! It's like I got more energy in my legs''

'There! I'll let you walk again'' Drew ordered, releasing or unfreezing Jared's legs. Jared could suddenly move his legs again, as he started to walk down the street. This time, he was able to keep up with Drew.

What would Drew do to him, when the reached the library?

121.content:
Drew and Jared walked through the glass doors at the entrance of the main public library, which was located right down the street from their school and a few blocks away from their house. Once they were inside, they strolled over to the central reference section so they could find the location for a book.

“I need to copy just a few lines from this old history book for class. Once I’m done with that, we can get out of here…” Drew pointed out. He wrote down the location of the book, before he walked over to aisles where the books were neatly kept on huge bookshelves, neatly stacked next to each other and filling the area all the way up until the 10ft ceiling.

In the meantime, Jared just wandered around the magazine section. He didn’t need to get any books at all from the library, and he just came along in order to keep Drew company. He just wanted to hang out for awhile, but he preferred to be outside instead. Somehow, he continually had the urge to hang out with Drew, and this has only increased ever since Drew got this weird “power” over his body.

Drew found the aisle where the book was being kept, so he now needed to find the shelf. Once he located it, he sighed when he realized, that the book was standing on the next to highest shelf in the large bookcase. It was almost 8ft above the ground, and he saw that he needed to get one of the ladders on wheels, which were being kept in the reference area. He didn’t want to go through the hassle of having to request assistance from anyone, so he decided to use Jared instead. But where was Jared?

“Rats… Where did he go?” Drew wondered when he turned around and noticed that Jared wasn’t right there behind him. “He wandered off on his own again…”

Then, he remembered that he could sense where Jared was, what he was doing, what he was thinking, and where he was going. Drew just closed his eyes, and indeed, he started to see visions of looking through Jared’s eyes, even though Jared was completely on the opposite side of the vast library.

“I need you over here, Jared” Drew thought.

Suddenly, Jared stopped and looked up. He had heard Drew’s voice ringing inside of his head. Suddenly, he had disappeared from where he was standing, dropping the book on the floor, from the moment he vanished into thin air.

“Hey! What did you do that for?” Jared complained, when he suddenly popped up right next to Drew, and by the aisle of books where the book was located, that Drew needed to use for his paper.

“Stop complaining! I just teleported you over here! So?”

“I was reading over a book on the other side of the section!” Jared grumbled. “You made me drop the book on the floor!”

“Oh don’t worry, I’ll send you back!” Drew explained. “In the meantime, I need for you to get that book for me. I need the one on that shelf, with the red spine!”

“I can’t reach…” Jared said when he was immediately overcome by the tingling feeling throughout his entire body!

Suddenly, Jared legs and torso began to grow longer! His legs started to stretch out even further, pushing his waist and upper body further from the ground. Next, his torso started to stretch as well, as his body felt like it was being stretched out by some invisible force. Jared quickly realized that it was Drew who was doing it, using his new powers!

Jared only gasped as he stared in front of him. The bookshelf seemed to be shrinking, but so did everything else around him. When he turned to look at Drew, he noted that he was now almost a foot taller than Drew was, and he was still growing taller!

Finally, the growth stopped just as Jared had reached the height of the entire bookshelf. His hairs almost touched the ceiling, when Drew made the growth stop. He didn’t want for Jared to grow out of the building!

“Wow! I’m really tall!” Jared gasped, as he looked down. He was standing over 2 feet taller than Dew. It was as if the whole world had shrunk!

Then, Jared just turned around and looked at the bookshelf in front of him. He was amazed that he was able to see the top shelf of the bookcase at his own eye level, without standing on the ladder!

Drew was totally amused when he realized how easily he could make his friend grow. He looked down and chuckled when he noted how long Jared’s legs had become, all thanks to him. Jared was ridiculously tall, he looked like his entire body had been stretched out like a rubber band, and he was completely delighted by the fact, that it was so easy for him to change or modify any part of his best friend’s body.

“Man that was a snap… That was just too easy…” he laughed, as he looked up and stared at his giant buddy. In the meantime, Jared had reached over and grabbed the book off the bookshelf.

“Here’s your book!” Jared said, as he held the book in his hand. Unfortunately, he was so tall, that Drew couldn’t even reach his arm.

“Wait, I gotta shrink you back because I still can’t reach that!”

Suddenly, Jared felt that familiar tingling feeling, and watched as his stretched out body slowly started to shrink back to normal. Within seconds, his torso had shrunk back, as well as his super-long legs.

Finally, Jared was back to how he used to be. He just looked up in disbelief, and stared in amazement at the top shelf and the ceiling in the aisle in the library.

“Wow… That was amazing, how you were able to make me grow like that!” he chuckled.

“Well, as soon as I’m done, you’ll need to grow for me again!” Drew said. “After all, you’ll need to put the book back!”

“Well, while you’re doing your research, mind if I continue reading my book?”

“Sure, I’ll send you back to the other section in the library…” Drew said, as he casually snapped his fingers. Instantly, Jared disappeared from the aisle, where the bookshelf was, and he reappeared again, where he was standing before. He saw his book, lying on the floor. He bent down and picked it up, so that he could continue reading it.

It was hard for him to concentrate on the book, when thoughts continue to fill his mind. What would Drew do to him, next?

Drew and Jared were walking past the outdoor basketball court, which was located at the park, which was on the way home from school. 'Oh come on! What's the matter?'

'I don't like basketball. I'm too short, I'm out of shape, and I really can't play it after all! Every time I try it, I keep on getting pushed around, and I can never score any points because I'm too short and I really can't shoot unless I'm standing right under the hoop'' Jared grumbled. 'Okay then' Freeze!' Drew said.

Instantly, Jared was completely frozen in time, and no longer able to move any part of his body.

'Now, you'll have the same basketball skills as a professional NBA player, without the money or the desire to play in the national league!' Drew said to the frozen Jared. 'You'll just be a great player who wants to play for fun!'

Since Jared was now six inches taller than Drew, he stared at him in confusion for a few moments.

'Drew' You've shrunk!'

'No, dude' You've grown taller! Just look around you!'

Jared looked around and realized, by seeing some familiar things on the street, which now all seemed a little smaller than they were before, that he had indeed grown a foot taller!

'Wow'.'

He made all the shots, he even was able to dunk the ball a few times, and he passed and shot the ball from just about any location on the court! He was almost like a perfect basketball player!

"Sure thing, Jared. Let me make you shorter so your mom doesn't freak out when she sees you, okay?" Drew says. Then, just as he said it, Jared feels that odd, tingling feeling, as Drew's mighty powers begin to work in him again. Then, Jared began to shrink back to about 6 feet tall. His legs shrank a few inches, as well as his torso and his arms. He was still tall and athletic, but not so tall so that he stood out, like he was when he was playing basketball. "So, there ya go. Is that okay for now?" Drew asked him.

Jared nodded. "Yup that'll do," he said. Only minutes later they were at Drew's house. "So let me call my mom and tell her I'm gonna be here at your place for a bit." This he did promptly on his cell phone as they stepped inside Drew's rather large and fairly new house. "You know I was thinking about going swimming, but first Drew could you make me more muscular?" Jared asked hesitantly. "I've always been embarassed by my body which is why I don't swim often, but now I don't have to be embarassed cause of your powers."

"No problem, Jared! I'll let you have whatever you want!" Drew grinned. "First, do you need to get home so you can get some clothes? I guess you need to get your swimming trunks and something to wear tonight and in the morning, right?"

"Can't your powers change my clothes too?" Jared asked. "Besides I want the muscle first, please."

"Sure, but you have to go and get your clothes at your house! Let's muscle you up, first... Hmm... " Just then, Drew's mother came walking into the room. "Drew! Drew! Please carry that box of books into the garage, will you? I just cleaned up daddy's old bookcase and we're going to drop off these books at Goodwill... You two boys can help carry this heavy box together and carry it from the living room to the garage, okay?" she shouted. "Sure, mom!!" Drew yelled back. Drew and Jared walked over to the living room and found a large box, filled with old, dusty books. "Oh, man... that look REALLY heavy, huh??"

Jared grinned. "Well then, let's muscle me up to make the job easier," he said cheerfully. "And once we've finished with the books I'll go get some clothes from home."

"Alright, dude... I'm in NO mood to carry a box of books... so, guess what? YOU'RE gonna do all the heavy lifting, after I make you gain sixty pounds worth of serious muscle!" Drew said out loud. Then, almost immediately, Jared was overcome by an intense tingling sensation in all his muscles. Right away, every muscle in his body began to inflate rapidly, just like Drew had commanded! The feeling was incredible! Jared couldn't move, but he felt his strength increase all over. It was an amazing feeling! "Ahh.... Look at you! How's that feel, dude?" Drew said, as he watched his best friend hulk out. Jared's biceps quickly grew by several inches, his pectorals ballooned outward and sideways, making his shoulders wider, and his flat stomach suddenly turned into a tiled floor of powerful abs.

Jared just felt an incredibly powerful rush of power within him as his muscles doubled in size. The strength owas just amazing, though his shirt was now stretched my his large pecs and wide shoulders. He had to take a few minutes to look over his new form, flexing one of his biceps and looking at the large bulge that formed and lifting up his shirt to look at his rock-hard six pack, touching them with a finger and marvelling at the solid ridges of muscle and the large pecs. He wasn't extremely outstanding, but he was more muscular than Drew now, and definitely more than he himself had ever been and he looked like an avid athlete and gymnast that had been doing a whole bunch of sports since he was a kid. "How about a little more? I want to look like I've been bodybuilding for several years."

Jared waited while Drew added more muscle though he didn't grow any taller, because drew decided to keep him at the same height. However, his added muscles made him look like an incredible muscle-man! His huge, thick arms with long, thick veins were just amazing. Massive quads and huge calves now supported the lower half of his body. And Jared now had a chest which was sticking out over a foot in front of him. He was truly looking massive in every way! "There, I think I just about have you maxed out, dude! Any more muscle, and you'd be immobile! Now, are you ready to head on home for a minute or two?" Drew asked him.

Jared's previous amazement was easily overshadowed. He was so huge it was unbelievable. He flexed his massive biceps and felt the immense strength flow through them. "Awesome, just awesome." His shirt had torn now, just completely and his shorts were a little tight. The extra muscle also made him think to get a couple inches of height back just to even things out. But first thing first, he'd made a deal so he bent down and easily picked up the books and carried them out to the garage. The box was so light now he didn't need any help at all to carry it, or rather he was so strong. He had to be careful when opening the door from the house to the garage actually so he didn't crumple the doorknob. He set the box down and didn't even feel sore or tired. "There, now send me home for my clothes please. I hope you can grow them because this shirt is destroyed," he added, ripping off the shredded shirt and showing his shirtless, ultra-muscular torso."

"Lookin' great, Jared! See? Don't you feel awesome? Look at you! Alright, big guy! First, I want all your clothes to fit you the way you are! Next, I want you to be standing in your bedroom right... now!" Drew then snapped his fingers, and Jared instantly vanished into thin air. One moment, Jared was looking at Drew at Drew's house. a fraction of a second later, Jared was standing in his bedroom!!! He had been teleported over three blocks away by his best friend! He traveled a mile in less than a blink of an eye, thanks to Drew's power.

Jared opened his dresser and grabbed his boardshorts as well as another pair of shorts and t-shirt. All his clothes were huge now, just to fit his now massive form. When he had them all packed into a bag he announced to his mom that he was going to be sleeping over. He sighed. How would he tell Drew to teleport him back? 'Maybe he can hear my thoughts,' Jared thought. 'Um, Drew?' he thought while imaging his thoughts being projected to his friend. Meanwhile, Drew was watching TV in the living room, while carefully monitoring the clock on the wall. When the next commercial break had arrived, he decided to close his eyes and concentrate on his best friend. A vage, blurry vision formed in his mind, of his freind gathering his clothes in his own bedroom. Then he saw Jared talking to his mother, telling her that he was going to spend the night at his house. Finally, Jared whispered Drew's name. This was when Drew realized that Jared was ready to come back.

"Time to come back, big guy. I want you to appear standing right in front of me, now!" Drew whispered. Instantly, Jared began to feel an intense tingling sensation throughout his body as he was teleported back to Drew's living room and found himself standing before his best friend.

Jared took a moment to steady himself. Teleports, he found, were like being on the ocean; they took time to get used to. He dropped his bag on the ground and sat next to his friend on the couch. "Hey could you put me back to being 6' 6'' please? The extra muscle needs a little extra height I think."

"Suuuure!" Drew grinned "I figured you were enjoying your height as a basketball player..." Drew just folded his arms and stared at Jared. Jared suddenly felt his legs stretch out by about eight inches! His torso grew by 4 inches as well. So now, when Jared stood up, he was suddenly a whole foot taller than he was before.

Jared grinned as he felt that warm feeling of change. The height came back and now his height balanced out his muscle. Quite honestly he was an incredible looking young man with height and muscle. "Look at these guns man," he said cheerfully flexing his massive biceps. "So what now? I kind of want to go to in the pool, but it'd be cool to go to the gym and see how much I can lift."
152.title: Jared grows more muscle

choices: Growing during the sleepover at Drew's house
Drew adds more muscle to Jared's 8-foot frame
Drew grows Jared even more overnight
Drew finally reverts Jared back to normal... for now!
1521.content:
There was a large community pool located down the street from the homes where Drew and Jared lived, and this was a popular hang out place for the teens, especially during the warm summer months. Kids, teens, and parents would lay on the lounge chairs or they would sit on the regular chairs under the umbrellas overlooking the pool while others would swim in the nice, warm water of the pool, which was shallow on one side and deep enough to dive in on the other. It even had a diving board on the deep end!

People were just going about their business, with kids playing in the pool while they were enjoying their summer vacation, when suddenly, a tall, muscular young man appeared out of nowhere, standing near the edge of the deep end of the pool. The big boy looked no older than some of the other, shorter kids who were there. However, he had the body of a basketball player mixed with that of a young up-and-coming bodybuilder. It was Jared, who was teleported over to the community pool area by his friend Drew, using his newly acquired powers which had given him complete control over his best friend.

Jared was only wearing big, long swimming trunks, which still failed to cover his thick, wide, muscular legs. Jared also had the biggest calves anyone had ever seen in recent memory. As Jared walked to the concrete steps, people saw the wide shoulders and the big, thick arms, hanging from the massive shoulder blades and the large, round pectorals. In the center of the muscle mass you could see the ripped, well-defined abdominal muscles, which resembled bricks in a backyard wall. Jared looked like a big bodybuilder with the face of a teenage boy.

As he slowly stepped into the pool, several of the ladies who were laying on the lounge chairs raised up their sunglasses just to get a good look at the big hunk who was getting in the pool before their very eyes. They had never seen such a big, tall, handsome young man at the pool before, and yet, the face just seemed vaguely familiar. The body was that of a young man who came straight out of a Muscle and Fitness magazine for sure. Everybody was looking at Jared, even the guys, the men and the boys, who were swimming in the pool and found themselves looking up at the muscular giant who was swimming just a few feet away from them.

Drew had changed into his swimming trunks and he walked over to the pool, since he couldn’t actually teleport himself. Later, he would figure out that he could “ride” along with Jared if he held on to his hand or if he touched Jared’s body while teleporting his pal somewhere. In the meantime, he just walked over to the pool, where Jared was already in the water when he arrived.

“Wow, the water’s nice and warm, big guy!” Drew smiled as he got in the pool.

Jared just splashed around, swimming on his back, when Drew climbed on top of him and sat on his torso, treating his buddy like a big, living raft. Jared continued to just float around the edge of the pool, using his long, thick legs to propel himself forward. All the others in the pool looked on with envy.

Finally, after ten minutes, another tall kid came walking by. The kid was tall and chubby, but he wasn’t as muscular as Jared. But he was almost just as tall. The kid jumped off the diving board, making a huge splash in the water, causing waves to hit all the other swimmers in the pool. Then, the kid started to tease the smaller, younger kids who were all swimming in the pool. Obviously, everyone knew this kid, since he came often, and he lived almost right next door to where the pool was located. The kid, who’s name was Butch, pushed some of the smaller boys under water and he pulled on the hair of some of the girls. He annoyed just about everyone in the pool, even causing some of the kids to get out of the water altogether. Of course, Drew and Jared just stayed out of the boy’s way and ignored him for as long as they could.

Eventually, it became hard to ignore the bully when Butch started splashing water all over Drew every time, he swam near him. Drew almost swallowed a big gulp of water, thanks to Butch.

“Hey! Cut that out! Quit splashing water all over me!” Drew shouted at him.

“What’s the matter? You’re already wet!” Butch just laughed as he used his big hands to push Drew’s head underwater.

“HEY! Knock it off!” Jared yelled at him, giving Butch a hard shove.

Just then, Drew came back to the surface and realized that Butch and Jared started splashing each other. They were the same height, so Drew thought it was time to give Jared a bigger advantage.

While Jared was standing before the bully at the shallow end of the pool, Jared was suddenly overcome by that sharp, intense, tingling sensation. Then, he realized he was having a growth spurt! He looked over and saw Drew smiling at him.

“Look, dude… Quit teasing everybody in the pool!” Jared told the bully.

“Yeah? Who’s gonna stop me? You and what army?” Butch sneered.

Then, Jared’s legs suddenly stretched out by more than a foot in length, making him very, very tall! Jared suddenly towered over Butch by more than a foot! Butch could only gasp in amazement as he watched Jared rapidly grow right before his eyes, growing taller and taller, until he was almost 8 feet tall! Butch looked up and gulped when he realized that Jared was much taller than him. How did that happen?

“Okay, little guy… I’m gonna stop you!” Jared shouted, as he easily picked up Butch and launched him in the air, making the boy hit the water with a loud plunge. Then, when Butch came back to the surface, Jared used his big hand to push his head underwater every time he came to the surface. Finally, after the third time, Butch was screaming for Jared to stop.

“Okay! Stop it! STOP! Stop pushing me in the water!” Butch shouted.

He was so loud, that the lifeguard finally walked over to the edge of the pool and ordered both boys to come out of the water right away. When Butch came out, he realized how BIG Jared was! This scared him enough, that he just grabbed his towel and walked away, running home as quickly as possible.

“There! We got rid of him!” Jared grinned as Drew walked up to him. Of course, Jared was standing a whopping 8 feet tall by now. He was a muscle GIANT!

“Can my friend go back into the pool?” Drew asked the lifeguard. “Butch was picking on all the other kids. You can’t put the blame on Jared for that!”

“Yeah, the big guy may go back in the pool” the lifeguard responded.

Jared walked up to the diving board and dove straight in. He was clearly the biggest kid in the pool. All the other kids went back as well, now that Butch was gone. This time, the kids saw how Jared was big and friendly, and how Jared was giving rides to other kids on his shoulders. Kids were climbing on his shoulders and jumping off him, having a blast. The lifeguard just nodded and enjoyed the scene, if everyone was safe, and nobody was harassing anyone in the pool.

After about an hour or so, Drew and Jared got out of the pool. Drew decided to let Jared stay at his incredible height. Jared looked great at his amazing size. Drew still wanted to decide whether to increase Jared’s muscles or not. But that came later, after they dried off and returned to Drew’s house.
1521.title: Pool

choices: Back in time to have a pose down with Hercules to see who is the alpha stud
Grow Jared's appetite so as he may outeat the powerlifter @ a buffet
Jared & a muscle man as big as Jared get into a huge fist fight
1522.content:
Drew & his hunk Jared decide to head to the gym to test out Jared's muscles. On the way there, Jared was being checked out by a lot of girls with their stud boyfriends yanking them back. This was raising Jared's self esteem so his stride took on more confidence as he pulled up his boulder shoulders & threw out his huge chest. Finally, they entered the gym where upon Jared's mouth practically watered upon seeing all those weights. His muscles wanted to be challenged. Drew got Jared a guest membership & off they went. Jared approached a big man benching 300 lb's with ease. "Need any help with that", offered Jared. The big man without looking @ Jared just glared & yelled at him, "The day I need help from a punk like you or anyone else is the day I am done with this gym. I have outlifted every man here with ease so I can outlift whoever you are any day". The new Jared did not take any guff off any man now so cockily replied, "Ok, Tubb, you are on, whoever outlifts who rules & the other leaves." The big man finished his set, told Jared he agreed, then turned around to see who he was dealing with. Internally, the big man felt a hint of fear for the first time but then reassured himself a power lifter like himself could easily outlift one of the drag muscle boys.

The first thing Jared got Drew to do was to increase the weight by putting on more plates till the bench was set for 400 lb's for a, "warm-up weight". The Big man had lifted that before (though never as a warm-up weight), so benched it with some ease as did Jared. Then Drew put on more plates. They were now lifting 500 lb's which the Big man then but was clearly challenged by. Jared did it with ease. Then the weight was increased to 600.
The big man nearly collasaped as there was no way he could bench 600 lb's despite getting all red in the face. Jared went to the weight but instead of benching it, he curled it with one arm. "Good-bye you big bully", roared Jared, 'stay out of my gym. You can spend more time feeding your gut".

Drew was nearly faint with pride. Who could possibly give his hunk Jared a real challenge? Suddenly he had an idea & shared it with Jared who agreed.
1522.title: Gym

choices: Jared grows even bigger during the buffet
After dinner is over, Jared goes back to the gym
15222.content:
Drew saw that Buck, the big muscle guy whom Jared had easily defeated, had crossed the street in order to go to the Chinese buffet so he could eat over there.

"Jared! You wanna join your buddy?" he asked his muscular friend.

"Sure... But then I'll get fat! Plus, I'm really not that hungry right now..." he replied sadly.

"No problem! I'll make it so that all your food will convert to muscle, and I'll give you a big appetite! Enjoy!" Drew laughed, as he snapped his fingers.

Instantly, Jared was overcome by a loud rumbling in his stomach!

"Ohhh man... I'm starving!" he groaned, as he felt that empty feeling in his stomach. He was famished!

Drew snapped his fingers again, and made Jared disappear. A second later, Jared popped up in the restaurant, with a plate in his hand. He quickly went to the buffet bar and filled his empty plate with chicken, rice, sushi, green beans, and shrimp, before sitting down at the same table where Buck was already eating his dinner. Buck realized that Jared was eating more than him! How was that possible???
15222.title: Grow Jared's appetite so as he may outeat t...

choices: Drew takes Jared's measurements.
a mad, passionate kiss for the two of them ends the evening.
152222.content:
Buck tried mightily to out eat Jared to show he could best him @ something but to no avail. By the time two hours had passed, Buck sat there almost sick & very, very bloated, while Jared looked very satisfied but looking the same physically as when he walked in. To make the evening even more horrible for him, his girlfriend dropped in, saw him so fat, & dropped him

However, after all those calories, Jared's body demanded that he return to the gym & lift heavy. However, he did not quite make it to the gym. Instead, Jared began lifting cars in the gym's parking lot. Wow, Drew was blow away by the site of Jared's muscles exploding with a power pump.

As Jared's clothes lay almost completely shredded around him from all the growth his body had taken on by converting all those calories to muscle, Jared begged Drew to give him a challenge so as to prove to him he could out-man any other big strong man. Drew was overcome with desire.
152222.title: After dinner is over, Jared goes back to the gym

choices: The boys meet a massive bodybuilder in the gym
The boys meet a giant muscle guy at the state fair
1522222.content:
"Jared, you could out-man anybody.... Anybody at all!" Drew smiled. "But it's late... Let's go home and go to bed!"

The two then changed and went home. Even when they arrived at the house, Drew had to shrink Jared back to normal, because he was just too big to even fit through the door!

Jared quickly shrunk back to his old self, which was around 5 ft 6 inches.

"There! I'll grow you some more tomorrow! Hopefully we'll meet other big muscles guys, and I'll make you big again!" drew said to him.

"How big will you make me?"

"Bigger than any guy you'll meet!"

Jared couldn't wait to see who he'll meet the next day, and to feel his body grow again. He knew Drew wouldn't let him down!

Before falling asleep, Drew came over to Jared's bed and kissed him. The boys truly loved each other deeply. Drew couldn't wait to make him grow again!
1522222.title: a mad, passionate kiss for the two of them ends...

choices: Someone hypotizes Drew to get control of the muscle granting powers
Jared has to defend Drew against an attact from five muscle men. Is he up to it?
15222222.content:
The next morning, the two young men ate a big, healthy breakfast, went for a jog, then decided to head to the state fair that was in town. The fair had the usual attractions which the two looked over before heading to the big tent. They noticed that one of the acts included a strong man. Jared could not stand the thought of some man being more attractive to Drew than himself, so Drew made Jared bigger but only gave him the identical strength & build of the strong man just to make things more fair & exciting. However, Jared was determined to prove he was the better man.

"Ladies & gentleman, introducing our own Hercules," announced the announcer. "Seems pretty chunky to me to be a Hercules," pouted Jared. "Remember," pointed out Drew, "the two of you have the same build." "I am built better than him," exclaimed Jared sucking in his gut & puffing out his chest. Indeed, he saw himself as the stronger man. Hercules went throught a number of impressive lifting demonstrations until the announcer said, "and so audience, that is it for the strongest man here whom no one has ever been able to challenge." "What," boomed Jared, "give me a chance & I will show you who the strongest man here is!" With that Jared used his thick thighs to quickly get down to the center ring. The two big men stood standing before each other, one big chest inches from the other. They stood glaring at each other. One of them was going down & each was determined it was going to be the other. They grabbed each other's hands in very firm grips, but neither noticing the power that might make a weaker man cry like a baby. They squeezed with muscle & will power, trying to get the other to go down. Finally Hercule's knees started to buckle with all the power coming from Jared & down he went. He could not believe he had been defeated after all these years.

Latter, Drew could not keep his hands of Jared's big biceps & shoulders (& everything else to). "I only gave you equal strength. How did you defeat him so easily?" "The one thing you do not give me as I already have it and that is the desire to impress & protect my man which is you," said Jared with a kiss.
15222222.title: The boys meet a giant muscle guy at the state fair

choices: Drew makes Jared grow at night in bed
Drew makes Jared grow several times at school
152222221.content:
Moments later, Zamu, the magician who had witnessed Jared's growth, walked up to Drew with a wild idea in the back of his mind.

"Wow, young man, that was a pretty amazing display of strength that you friend Jared had there! How is that possible?" he asked Drew.

"Oh, I can make his muscles bigger, among other things..."

"Really? What else can you do? Can you change other people, too?" Zamu asked.

"No, only Jared! I can control his body! I can make him shrink or grow, and I can change his weight, height, age, or shape... I can fill him with air, gas or water, and I can turn him into a balloon or make him invisible... I can do whatever I want... But my favorite thing to do is grow his muscles!" Drew explained excitedly.

Then Zamu held up his index finger and pointed it at Drew's face.

"Look at my finger... Look deep at my finger... From now on... Whenever you hear the word 'grow'... You will cause your friend's muscles to grow a little bigger... No matter where you are... You will do it every time!" Zamu said in a commanding voice.

"Uhh... Yes... I will make his muscles grow..." Drew repeated in the same tone of voice, like he was in a trance, before snapping out of it.

"There... Now... Look at those flowers over there... They grow so nicely this time of year, don't they?" Zamu remarked.

"Uhh... Yes... Uhh... Grow... Jared's muscles need to grow some more..." Drew whispered.

Meanwhile, a few yards away from there, Jared suddenly felt his muscles tingle, before he experienced a quick growth spurt!

"Hey! What the---?" he gasped, as his calves and thighs bulged a little more, and his pecs increased in size, making him even bigger! "Why... Did Drew just make me grow just now?"

Jared wasn't wearing a shirt, but his shorts were getting unbearably tight, due to his massive legs!

He didn't realize that Drew had been hypnotized to make him grow every time he heard the word "grow"!
152222221.title: Someone hypotizes Drew to get control of the mu...

choices: Drew grows Jared's muscles some more
The spell is broken!
1522222212.content:
Jared was walking around the hallway at school, right after he had gotten his books out of his locker. They still had three minutes before the first bell rang.

"Oh man, I need to use the bathroom!" he said, as he walked in the bathroom and pulled down the zipper.

Just at that moment, one of the teachers was showing off his new plants as Drew walked by.

"Look how much my new rose has grown! Isn't it pretty?"

"Grow? Oh! Jared's calves will grow a little bit right now!" Drew said out loud.

Jared had just finished taking a leak when he felt a tingling sensation in his calf muscles.

"Hey! What the....?"

KKKRRRRRRRR!!!

His calves suddenly inflated a little more! His muscles hardened and they magically bulged out from the back of his legs, growing with more muscle!

"Uhhh! What... What just happened?" Jared gasped. Luckily, he was wearing shorts! But his calves were starting to put a strain on his socks!

Jared grabbed his bag and walked out of the bathroom and found his classroom. There he located an empty seat where he sat down.

Drew had just taken his seat at the desk when the teacher started class as well.

"Now we'll discuss the human anatomy chart and how people grow over time!" the teacher began.

"Grow? Oh! Umm... Jared's pecs will grow a bit right now!" Drew said out loud.

"Drew! Care to share anything with the rest of the class?" the teacher asked.

Meanwhile, three rooms down the hall, Jared was listening to the teacher when he was suddenly overcome by a tingling sensation in his chest!

"Oh no.... Not... again...." he groaned.

KKKKKKRRRRRRRRRRR!!!!!

Jared's pectorals came to life as both muscles suddenly ballooned out of nowhere, straining his t-shirt! They pushed further outward and sideways, making Jared's chest seem really enormous!

His chest began to press up against the edge of the desk! His pecs were just getting huge!

CRACK!

Jared's desk snapped off! The wooden top of the desk just snapped off and fell on the ground!

"JARED! What are you doing?"

"I... My... My desk was getting too small for my... uhhh.... chest!"

A couple of the students laughed as they saw how big his chest had become.

"Come and sit at the big table in the back of the room!"

"Yes, ma'am!"

Jared just sat in the back, with his huge chest and bulging calves, wondering when the next growth spurt would occur...
1522222212.title: Drew makes Jared grow several times at school

info.brief_description: What would you do if you could control the size and muscles of your best friend?
info.description:
A benevolent, alien spirit moves across the county, looking for instances where one person has a friend or a loved one, who is still alive, on his or her mind. The spirit causes the two people to fall into a deep sleep for fifteen minutes. When they have woken up, the person who always worries about the other, will find that he or she is suddenly in complete control of the other person's mind and body! What happens, when someone discovers that his mind and body is controlled by another person?

Drew and Jared are two teenage boys, going through the last year in high school. Both are 17 and they are in all the same classes together. They are best friends and they live right next door from each other.

Drew is average at about 5ft 9" tall and he's in pretty good shape. He has long black hair and he has an athletic build. He's pretty happy with himself.

Jared is only 5ft 6" tall and he's as skinny as a board. He has short, brown hair. He's not athletic at all. He's a bit of a geek, he's clumsy and slow. He has no physical strength at all. Jared hates his body, but he doesn't know what to do to make it better.

The benevolent spirit passes over these two boys while they're walking home from school on the last day of the school year, and at the start of the summer vacation. Suddenly, both boys collapse as they walk through the park. Nobody is around to see them. They are unconscious for twenty minutes, when they both wake up at the same time.

Suddenly, Drew can feel, hear, and see everything in and about Jared, including his thoughts, desires and emotions. Drew starts to realize that he can change any aspect of Jared, simply by imagining what he should say, do, or look like. Not only that, but Drew can make Jared do anything he wants, and he can teleport him through space, time, and distance, anywhere in the whole World or any time in history. He would always maintain permanent, telepathic contact with Jared, no matter where or when he teleports Jared to. When Drew teleports Jared, he can also teleport himself to travel to other places and times, so that the boys are always together.

Finally, Drew can make Jared invisible or even into a ghost. He can also suspend or freeze Jared, and he controls Jared's mind, thoughts, feelings and memories. As an added bonus, Drew can even make Jared's body float or levitate in mid air!

Whatever Drew does to Jared, it only works, as long as Drew is doing it so that Jared is helped in any way. Jared must always end up as the star, the best, the strongest, the fastest, and the champion at everything he does. Drew can also make Jared look like anybody else, but temporarily. All Drew's changes will have a maximum time limit of 24 hours, before Jared returns to normal automatically.

Drew has a muscle fetish and LOVES to make Jared's muscles inflate until he's a huge HULK of a boy. Drew also enjoys making Jared grow into a GIANT for a few moments, and shrinks him back to normal again.

Nobody else can control Jared, but Drew.

This is the story of Jared, under Drew's complete control.

*****STORY UPDATE******

1. Drew can give somebody else total control over Jared temporarily just by saying it, but it would only last for 10 minutes before the power returns to Drew.

2. Anyone who is touching Drew or his clothes (while he's wearing them) also has complete control over Jared because the power flows from Drew to the other person, allowing the other person to command Jared to change or do things.

3. Anyone standing within 6 feet of Drew can make Jared's muscles grow as long as Drew approves. There is NO LIMIT to the maximum size of Jared's muscles.
